nodes.text: Mon Cala's military comprised the standing army of Mon Cala's Mon Calamari. It was led by the King of Mon Cala, who acted as the Supreme Commander of the military as part of his duties.

Around 21 BBY, a civil war broke out between the Mon Calamari and the Quarren, and Mon Cala's military was forced to fight them off. Many of the soldiers died after the battle, and the rest of the army joined up with the Quarren and rebuilt the task force led by Prince Lee-Char.
